comments.text:
NSPR release notes may need to be updated.

The ftp site mentions v4.8.8:
  https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/mozilla.org/nspr/releases

Project page and release notes as of Feb document 4.8.3 as the latest:
  http://www.mozilla.org/projects/nspr/
  http://www.mozilla.org/projects/nspr/release-notes/

ps>  A Documentation component is not offered for NSPR in bugzilla so it was placed in the NSPR component.
comments.author: joey@mozilla.com
comments.creator: joey@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
NSPR release notes may need to be updated.

The ftp site mentions v4.8.8:
  https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/mozilla.org/nspr/releases

Project page and release notes as of Feb document 4.8.3 as the latest:
  http://www.mozilla.org/projects/nspr/
  http://www.mozilla.org/projects/nspr/release-notes/

ps>  A Documentation component is not offered for NSPR in bugzilla so it was placed in the NSPR component.
